replies.body: I'm Happy that the missions are giving a decent amount all up this time in relation to the cost of the items.

I'm very disappointed that the chroma bundles are added into the border and skin bundle, each champion with border costs over 3400 rp (excluding irelia) considering that I plan on buying 3 of the champs including the prestige skin, I either have to play everyday to get the borders and enough tokens for prestige or waste about 9000rp on chroma I'm not going to use.

Marketing my friend! 
Either buy the pass, play the game a shittonne and give your time, or use the money route and buy it if you're short on time! 
Either way, get some RP, there's a special ;)
Yeah same here I am pretty sad for how much the skins cost, I was really hoping for a bundle with all the skins too but they only have individual border bundles {{item:3070}}
Hey guys, can someone tell me how I can go about acquiring the project backpack?

So it will be available through the [merch store](https://merch.riotgames.com/en_AU/), but it looks like the new project stuff isn't available yet.

Given there doesn't even appear to be images for the Unlocked statue and the art print, it seems likely it's a "coming soon", though it'd be nice if that was actually mentioned in the article :P

IIRC the merch usually launches a little after the game content, but within the scope of the event so hopefully that can give you a tentative idea.

I personally don't like that when I hear an "event" is coming to league of legends its been 3 times out of a 5 a series of skins and missions which encourage a new purchase every time. Besides tft, we have been starved of an actual "rotating" gamemode since Nexus blitz or a little URF after the mishap. 

I would really love to catch wind of a new mode in development or the team has been working hard to bring back some of the more popular classics (Nexus blitz, all for one or even a new mode like Odyssey or star guardian event).

As a player who has played for at least 4 years, while constant missions and skins keep the ball rolling, the game has been lacking the WOW factor from actual events.

TLDR: I feel League needs more actual events (rotating modes, Odyssey etc..) and frequency of the new skins + buy pass.

Thanks for reading :)
